docs.snippet: Shahid Khan has created one of the more unlikely sports tandems in the world with his two teams: the N.F.L. Jacksonville Jaguars and Fulham of England’s Premier League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shahid Khan has created one of the more unlikely sports tandems in the world with his two teams: the N.F.L. Jacksonville Jaguars and Fulham of England’s Premier League.
docs.abstract: Auto-parts magnate Shahid Khan has created one of the more unlikely sports tandems in world with his two teams, NFL Jacksonville Jaguars and Fulham Soccer team of England’s Premier League;  most owners of American and English teams have viewed their clubs as too distinct to integrate, but Khan has committed Jaguars to playing home games in London over next four seasons, while Fulham will play friendlies in Florida.

headline.main: Owner of Jaguars and Fulham Seeks Football Fusion
